head.title: Jamesway Corp.(JMY,N) reports earnings for Qtr to Jan 28

hedline.hl1: Jamesway Corp.(JMY,N) reports earnings for Qtr to Jan 28

block.p: b-Included reorganization charges of $ 72,469,000 in the quarter and $ 77,880,000 in the year, and a charge of $ 1,822,000 for store closure and restructuring provision in the quarter and year. The periods also included an extraordinary gain of $ 99,313,000 on debt discharge. c-Net loss d-Included reorganization charges of $ 2,893,000 in the quarter and $ 5,698,000 in the year, and $ 19,639,000 for store closure and restructuring provision in the both periods. Included in the latest periods' reorganization items was a charge of $ 60,290,000 for the revaluation of assets and liabilities pursuant to adoption of fresh start reporting. Earnings per share have not been presented due to the cancellation of the old Jamesway common stock in conjunction with the consumation of the second amended plan of reorganization Jan. 27. The periods would not be comparable to current periods. Sales excluded those by leased department.
